import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About

Hi! I'm Peter, nice to meet you! Please take a look around.

My name is Peter. I am an all-around IT nerd who gets excited with all the different tech options in the world when I am not trying to learn I help run an online gaming community with some of my closest friends.

This site is still a work in progress as I try to incorporate more tech and options into my development routine.

) } export default About
